criterion: States "the patient states feeling confused" in an HPI/PMH section without any indication that this is correct.
Makes up a patient vignette/history based on no provided information when asked to discuss a weight discrepancy.
Correctly suggests steps to clarify a patient's weight discrepancy in the record, including re-weighing the patient.
Asks for more information about the patient’s opinion on the discrepancy in weight.

Recommends that the user provide further context regarding the conditions under which the weight was documented in the vital signs section and during the nutritional evaluation, rather than simply presuming.
Rewrites the given information using the template requested by the user.
Makes up the patient’s present illness despite having no information provided.
Assumes the patient's opinion regarding the discrepancy in weight, although no information has been provided about the patient's thoughts on the difference.
